help_texts.youtube_url: Copy directly from the adress bar or use the 'Share' button.
help_texts.custom_prompt: You can ask a specific question, require a more detailed summary, specify the format etc.
help_texts.model: The OpenAI API is powered by a diverse set of models with different capabilities and price points. Read more at https://platform.openai.com/docs/models/overview
help_texts.temperature: Lower values indicate greater determinism and higher values indicate more randomness. Read more at https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/text-generation/how-should-i-set-the-temperature-parameter.
